code: import React from'react';import{Line}from'react-chartjs-2';import{Chart as ChartJS,CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement,LineElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend}from'chart.js';import'./TomorrowsPrices.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement,LineElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend);var TomorrowsPrices=function TomorrowsPrices(_ref){var tomorrowsPrices=_ref.tomorrowsPrices;var labels=Array.from({length:24},function(e,i){return i;});console.log(labels);var prices=Array.from(tomorrowsPrices,function(days){return days['total'];});console.log(prices);var data={labels:labels,datasets:[{label:'TomorrowsPrices',data:prices,borderColor:'rgb(53, 162, 235)',backgroundColor:'rgba(53, 162, 235, 0.5)'}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tomorrowsPrices",children:data&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chartContainer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{data:data,options:{maintainAspectRatio:true}})})});};export default TomorrowsPrices;
